IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_game_money_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_game_money_event_log GO
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_game_money_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_game_money_event_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_game_money_event_log @id INT, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @log_type TINYINT, @player_id dbo.id_t, @game_money BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Game_Money_Event_Logs SET log_type = @log_type, player_id = @player_id, game_money = @game_money, log_at = GETDATE() WHERE id = @id AND guild_id = @guild_id IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Guild_Game_Money_Event_Logs (id, guild_id, log_type, player_id, game_money, log_at) VALUES(@id, @guild_id, @log_type, @player_id, @game_money, GETDATE()) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_game_money_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_game_money_event_log GO
